alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:30PM CDT until August 13 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...HUTCHINSON... HANSFORD...EASTERN SHERMAN...NORTHWESTERN ROBERTS...NORTHWESTERN OCHILTREE AND NORTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Morse, or 19 miles west of Spearman, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Borger, Guymon, Perryton, Spearman, Sunray, Stinnett, Goodwell, Gruver, Hardesty, Farnsworth, Waka, Pringle, and Morse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
